translations.english: Xiang Yu burned and killed Xin.

translations.chinese: 而周苛、樅公相謂曰：「反國之王，難與守城。」
translations.english: Zhou Ke and Lord Song said to each other: "The king of a rebellious kingdom is difficult to defend the city with."
King Han left Xingyang and reached Chenggao.

translations.chinese: 自成皋入關，收兵欲復東。
translations.english: From Chenggao he entered the passes, gathered troops, and wanted to advance east again.
